title: Strategic Business Plan Development & Market Analysis
description: We're seeking an experienced business strategist to develop a comprehensive business plan and conduct thorough market analysis for our expanding startup. The work will involve researching market opportunities, analyzing competitive landscapes, and creating strategic roadmaps. You'll help us identify growth opportunities and develop actionable strategies for market expansion.

milestones.title: Market Research & Competitive Analysis
milestones.description: Conduct comprehensive market research and analyze competitive landscape.

milestones.title: Strategic Business Plan Development
milestones.description: Develop detailed business plan with strategic roadmaps and growth projections.

milestones.title: Implementation Strategy & Presentation
milestones.description: Create implementation strategy and present findings in executive-ready format
